activities.loc: Courtroom B, Third Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ryan Allen Westerman

records.addlTxt: Calendar call on November 30, 2022 at 09:45 am.

3:03 PM Defendant Ryan Allen Westerman appeared by video.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Ryan Allen Westerman.  Prosecuting attorney David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information. Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Defendants Attorney pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set. Bond continued.
Preliminary hearing on August 29, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

10:41 AM Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ryan Allen Westerman appeared by video.  Attorney Colin Nicholson appeared by video  for attorney C. James Fitzgerald and defendant Ryan Allen Westerman. Preliminary hearing requested by zoom and set.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

3:11 PM Prosecuting attorney David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ryan Allen Westerman appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Ryan Allen Westerman. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Defendant address verified. Signature bond set of $5000 with conditions. No contact directly or indirectly with victim JJ, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No contact with Mr. Splash Car Wash. May have one time contact through third party to pick up personal belongings.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.
